metadata.symbol: Preparing For The Future Of Entertainment
metadata.description:
This is a monetizable NFT

When you buy this NFT we will handle the process of monetising it for you through exhibiting it within our Metatron platform that is currently being developed.

Featuring mobile games that has been developed by SIFOR and many other game studios too. Users will be able to get into the rooms to experience and play the games too. However each room will represent the game studio, artist, musician, or even a celebrity that wants to be expressed in a room like experience within Metatron.

For more information please contact us here.
metadata.title: Arcade Game Room 001 - Elevate Me
metadata.subtitle: Arcade Game Room 001 by Metatron
